version_description: Automatically update cached usage data when usage settings are changed.
Automatically update cached usage data when usage settings are changed.

- Added additional types of service to usage graphs (Utility support required).
- Improved accessibility for vision impaired users.
- Fixed Rotation bugs and a memory leak when viewing usage on iPad.

- Added additional types of service to usage graphs (Utility support required).
- Improved accessibility for vision impaired users.
- Fixed Rotation bugs and a memory leak when viewing usage on iPad.

- Added additional types of service to usage graphs (Utility support required).

- Added support for iOS push notifications.
- Display Auto Pay Terms and Conditions when configuring Auto Pay.
- Raised minimum supported version of the app to iOS 8.0
- Various bugfixes.

- Added support for iOS push notifications.
- Display Auto Pay Terms and Conditions when configuring Auto Pay.
- Raised minimum supported version of the app to iOS 8.0
- Various bugfixes.
Fixed an error where comments were not being saved with outage reports.
Fixed an error where comments were not being saved with outage reports.

- Enabled TouchID authentication on supported devices.
- Added Support for new MasterCard BIN range.
- Bug fixes.

- Enabled TouchID authentication on supported devices.
- Added Support for new MasterCard BIN range.
- Bug fixes.

- Added High and Low cost values to Usage details view where available.
- Added Prepaid Arrangement Amount to prepaid payments when appropriate.
- Ensure Contact Tracking submissions contain a comment.
- Show multiple usages on telecom wireless usage data.

- Added High and Low cost values to Usage details view where available.
- Added Prepaid Arrangement Amount to prepaid payments when appropriate.
- Ensure Contact Tracking submissions contain a comment.
- Show multiple usages on telecom wireless usage data.

Validate credit card length before accepting a payment.
Display wireless usage plan details for shared plans (telecom usage support required).
Improved error messages on payment failure.

Validate credit card length before accepting a payment.
Display wireless usage plan details for shared plans (telecom usage support required).
Improved error messages on payment failure.

* Added the Add New Provider option. This gives you the ability to login to multiple providers and switch between them. Once you login to a second provider, you can switch between the providers by selecting a provider in the Service Providers section in Settings.
* Fixed a bug where prepaid accounts could potentially make 0 dollar payments.
* Fixed default temperatures in usage data display when no data is available.

* Added the Add New Provider option. This gives you the ability to login to multiple providers and switch between them. Once you login to a second provider, you can switch between the providers by selecting a provider in the Service Providers section in Settings.
* Fixed a bug where prepaid accounts could potentially make 0 dollar payments.
* Fixed default temperatures in usage data display when no data is available.

* Fix usage display if the cost option has been toggled (utility support required).
(2.28)
* Added the Add New Provider option. This gives you the ability to login to multiple providers and switch between them. Once you login to a second provider, you can switch between the providers by selecting a provider in the Service Providers section in Settings.
* Fixed a bug where prepaid accounts could potentially make 0 dollar payments.
* Fixed default temperatures in usage data display when no data is available.

* Fix usage display if the cost option has been toggled (utility support required).
(2.28)
* Added the Add New Provider option. This gives you the ability to login to multiple providers and switch between them. Once you login to a second provider, you can switch between the providers by selecting a provider in the Service Providers section in Settings.
* Fixed a bug where prepaid accounts could potentially make 0 dollar payments.
* Fixed default temperatures in usage data display when no data is available.

* Added the ability to make miscellaneous payments.
* Improved ability to retrieve stored Auto Pay methods.
* Made push notifications more reliable.

* Added the ability to make miscellaneous payments.
* Improved ability to retrieve stored Auto Pay methods.
* Made push notifications more reliable.

- Added ability to see sub-hourly utility usage (utility provider support required).
- Added telecom data usage detail pie chart (telecom provider support required).
- Added support for telecom reconnect service order at time of payment (telecom provider support required).
- Removed warning about not being reconnected when a provider doesn't charge a reconnect fee.

- Added ability to see sub-hourly utility usage (utility provider support required).
- Added telecom data usage detail pie chart (telecom provider support required).
- Added support for telecom reconnect service order at time of payment (telecom provider support required).
- Removed warning about not being reconnected when a provider doesn't charge a reconnect fee.

* Raised minimum supported iOS version to 9.0.
* Enhanced Outage Reporting for utility members.
* Improved device location handling.
* Removed error telling the user they were locked out when login timed out.
* Set payment amount to display US dollars, regardless of device locale setting.

* Raised minimum supported iOS version to 9.0.
* Enhanced Outage Reporting for utility members.
* Improved device location handling.
* Removed error telling the user they were locked out when login timed out.
* Set payment amount to display US dollars, regardless of device locale setting.
Fixed crash when making a payment while the device region is not set to United States.
Fixed crash when making a payment while the device region is not set to United States.
